content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 5, Espanyol 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 5, Espanyol 0.
Foul by Paulinho (Barcelona).
Pape Diop (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Barcelona 5, Espanyol 0. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ousmane Dembélé.
Attempt blocked. Gerard Moreno (Espanyol) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pape Diop.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Espanyol 0. Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) header from very close range to the top right corner. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a cross following a corner.
